lead_paragraph: The United States had two players ejected but managed to earn a 1-1 draw with Italy in the World Cup, keeping its hopes of advancing alive. To have a shot at the Round of 16, the Americans must defeat Ghana, which beat the Czech Republic, 2-0, in the biggest upset of the tournament.
